subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Alex Colome and four relievers combined for a four-hitter, and the Tampa Bay Rays beat Baltimore in St. Petersburg, Fla., in a relocated home game for the Orioles.
snippet: Alex Colome and four relievers combined for a four-hitter, and the Tampa Bay Rays beat Baltimore in St. Petersburg, Fla., in a relocated home game for the Orioles.
